articles.title: Withings adds temperature tracking to the new ScanWatch 2 - The Verge
articles.description: At IFA 2023, Withings announced its next-gen ScanWatch 2 and an entry-level ScanWatch Light. The ScanWatch 2 adds a new temperature-tracking module that could potentially alert users to illnesses.
articles.content:

articles.title: OnePlus to launch Android 14 in September - 9to5Google
articles.description: OnePlus has announced its Android 14 update, OxygenOS 14, which will bring performance upgrades to the brand's phones.
articles.content:
OnePlus has today announced that it will launch OxygenOS 14, the brand’s skin on top of Android 14, on September 25.
